#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    Log_info("Called Put function of kvserver.");
  bool isLeader = 0;
  bool* ptr_isLeader = &isLeader;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  uint64_t* ptr_term = &term;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(ptr_isLeader,ptr_term);
  if(isLeader == 0)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallablePtr(s);
    uint64_t ind = 0;
    uint64_t term = 0;
    uint64_t *ptr_ind = &ind;
    uint64_t *ptr_term = &term;
    bool raft = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallablePtr,ptr_ind,ptr_term);
    //Log_info("Back to kvserver put");
    Coroutine::Sleep(300000);
    //Log_info("After coroutine Sleep");
    if(oplog.find(s->data_[0])!=oplog.end())
    {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
  }
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    Log_debug("Called Append function of kvserver.");
  bool isLeader = 0;
  bool* ptr_isLeader = &isLeader;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  uint64_t* ptr_term = &term;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(ptr_isLeader,ptr_term);
  if(isLeader == 0)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else if(oplog.find(to_string(oid))!=oplog.end())
  {
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();


    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallablePtr(s);
    uint64_t ind = 0;
    uint64_t term = 0;
    uint64_t *ptr_ind = &ind;
    uint64_t *ptr_term = &term;
    bool raft = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallablePtr,ptr_ind,ptr_term);
    //Log_info("Back to kvserver append");
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    //Log_info("After coroutine Sleep");
    if(oplog.find(s->data_[0])!=oplog.end())
    {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
  }
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    Log_debug("Called Get function of kvserver.");
  bool isLeader = 0;
  bool* ptr_isLeader = &isLeader;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  uint64_t* ptr_term = &term;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(ptr_isLeader,ptr_term);
  if(isLeader == 0)
  {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else if(oplog.find(to_string(oid))!=oplog.end())
  {
    *v = kv_store_[k];
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    std::shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallablePtr(s);
    uint64_t ind = 0;
    uint64_t term = 0;
    uint64_t *ptr_ind = &ind;
    uint64_t *ptr_term = &term;
    bool raft = GetRaftServer().Start(marshallablePtr,ptr_ind,ptr_term);
    //Log_info("Back to kvserver get");
    Coroutine::Sleep(200000);
    //Log_info("After coroutine Sleep");
    if(oplog.find(s->data_[0])!=oplog.end())
    {
      *v = kv_store_[s->data_[2]];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
      //
    }
  }
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  oplog.insert(v->data_[0]);
  if(v->data_[1]=="put")
  {
    kv_store_[v->data_[2]] = v->data_[3];
  }
  else if(v->data_[1]=="append")
  {
    string temp = kv_store_[v->data_[2]];
    kv_store_[v->data_[2]] = temp+v->data_[3];
  }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
